rows.label: tlk70000039_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I liked playing with mud and clay even
as a child, so it's no surprise that I
wound up as a potter.

rows.label: tlk70000039_03_msg0002
rows.name:
No two hand-crafted pots are quite the
same, you see? The colors, shapes,
textures...they're all subtly different.

rows.label: tlk70000039_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Just as this land of Iira taught me
that variety can be a great treasure...

rows.label: tlk70000039_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I too want to teach people about the
joy of things that are unique. That's
what I try to achieve with my craft.

rows.label: tlk70000039_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Though I suppose I never got through
to the person I wanted to understand
me the most...
